name: Sacred Soundscapes for the Chakras (The 7 Rays)
description:
Three dimensional sounds as a source of meditation (Samadhi).

This music is composed to effect the listeners consciousness and encourage an intergration of the inner and outer being.

This album includes 12 continuous tracks featuring:

African Talking Drum, Keyboard (Pythagorean Scale), Steel Drum, congas, Korean Gong, Japanese Garden Gong, and Calabash (Gourds immersed in water and played with mallets). Also included are seven tuned Crystal Bowls, Noah Bells, Tuning Forks, Chimes, Tabla Baya, American Indian Flute, Conch Shell, Udu Drum (Clay Pot), Tiny Shaw, Rain Stick, Bell, Balafon (African Xylophone), Drum Set, Brushes, Wood Block, Synthesizer, Frame Drum, hand hammered Turkish Cymbals, and Tibetan Singing Bowls.

54:37

Music composed and played by Mark Alan Krebs.

Additional artists:
Jim Black (saxophone)
John Davis (bass)

name: Arc of the Ceremony
description:
A live recording at the Holualoa Cafe on the big island of Hawaii.
This album includes 5 continuous tracks featuring:
Sha-na Wo (djun djun)
Renee Wo (flute, harp)
Sommer (vocals, harmonium)
Mark Krebs (vocals, percussion)

27:33

Music composed and played by Mark Alan Krebs.

name: Celestial Reign
description:
This album features the sound of pure quartz crystal bowls. This is a perfect album for peace perfection or sleep.
Instrumentation:
American & Eastern Indian Flutes, Japanese Garden Gong, 7 Pure Quartz Crystal Bowls, Udu Drum (African Clay Pot), Frame Drum (India), Voice, Rainstick, Tibetan Singing Bowls, Om Chimes, Birds, Wind, Crickets.

This album includes 3 continuous tracks.

16:07


Music composed and played by Mark Alan Krebs.

name: Transcendant Rhythm
description:
This album is a compilation of Sound Scapes for the Chakras and Arc of the Ceremony. This recording truly reveals transcendant sounds that speak directly to the soul. It features an extended version of the balinese xylophone.

This album includes 5 continuous tracks.

22:03

Music composed and played by Mark Alan Krebs.

name: Soul 7
description:
This album is a compilation of Sound Scapes for the Chakras and Arc of the Ceremony. It features exotic vocal textures and cellular sounds to balance and relax. It is a continuous stream of organic, raw music.

This album includes 9 continuous tracks.

43:49

Music composed and played by Mark Alan Krebs.
